dct_title_s: A new map of michigan with its canals, roads & distances
dct_description_sm: Washington prime meridian. "Entered according to Act of Congress, in the year 1846, by H.N. Burroughs, in the Clerks Office of the Eastern District of Pennsylvania." 29. in upper right margin. Inset: Western part of michigan [ca. 1:3,000,000] 1 map: col., encapsulated in Mylar with barrier sheet; 34 x 27 cm
dct_rights_sm: This map is in the public domain.
dct_rightsHolder_sm: Please attribute access and use of this digitized map to the Stephen S. Clark Library, University of Michigan Library. https://www.lib.umich.edu/about-us/policies/copyright-policy
